query:
SELECT DISTINCT ON (p.ID) p.ID as id, p.Site as site, p.Area as area, p.SU as us, p.Shape as form, p.Ext_Decoration as decoration, p.Decoration_Type as decoration_type, p.Fabric as fabric, p.Dating as period, p.Notes as description, m.Image_ID as media_id, m.Filename as filename, m.Full_Path as filepath
        FROM Pottery p
        
            JOIN Images m ON m.Image_ID = p.Image_ID
            
        WHERE (p.Ext_Decoration = 'Yes' OR p.Int_Decoration = 'Yes')
        ORDER BY p.ID
